All Quests and Sidequests in Baldur's Gate 3 Map

One of the most important games in a game like BG3 is Quests. The Main quest, regarding the tadpole and your ceremorphosis, is not the only thing available to players. There is a huge amount of side quests at your disposal, and you can even resolve them in the mo
